title: Ping Spike on New Client
body: I've played a few games on the new client prior to this patch and after the patch as well and my ping in-game spikes quite a bit. I'm not sure what is causing this, but when I switch to the legacy client, my ping just fine with no spikes at all. I'm usually at 33 ping, but on the new client it'll spike to the hundreds and this happens every so often.

replies.body: It sounds like a coincidence that your ping is varying between clients, because neither versions actually affect gameplay.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these games to get an overview of what exactly is going on.  Let me know what you find!

On the new client: 

> NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: PING ISSUES
> 
> Average ping was 39 milliseconds.
> 
> The worst ping you experienced was 171ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. 
> 
> Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.30%.
> 
> Overall, this means you had a low amount of packets lost during the game.

On the old client

> NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: NO ISSUES
> 
> The worst ping you experienced was 47ms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game.
> 
> You had minimal packet loss during this game, meaning you had a very stable connection.

These games were played on the same day and within a hour-ish of each other.

Thanks for the follow-up on this.  I'm still not convinced that your in-game ping is a consequence of the client, so I'd like to offer one more thing.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and follow each step to tune up your connection and make sure your comms with our game server is configured.  Let me know how that works out.
I've done all of those things and my ping still spikes on the new client. My fps is also lower on the new client as opposed to the old one.

That's a bummer to hear, but I appreciate you trying.  Let's have our tech team look into this and help you individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  When you get a chance, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to the ticket for more context.  We'll reply back asap!
